definition: to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)

sentences.english: Even her soul, so strong for rhapsody, was not enough.
sentences.chinese: 甚至於她那特別善於狂想的靈魂也不足掛齒。

sentences.english: It's a trifle thing not worth mentioning.
The risk is as nothing compared to the gain.
sentences.chinese: 所冒風險與所得相比不足掛齒。

sentences.english: The beautiful mountains and streams are worth visiting.
